name: JPMML
body:
### Welcome to JPMML Page.

This is the homepage of the PMML project. It's an implementation in Java of the [PMML](http://www.dmg.org/v4-1/GeneralStructure.html) language.

It allows you to evaluate a model in PMML, or to generate a Java code that is equivalent to what does the model. I, @tbadie, am the current maintainer and I am working as a [Turn](turn.com) employee.

This project is intended to be open-source, which means that bug reports, questions, discussions and contributions are more than welcome.

The [wiki](https://github.com/turn/jpmml/wiki) is currently under construction but will contain all the ressources about the project.

Thank you for reading and hope you'll enjoy the project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
